history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER Fifth and Atwood
TTS Okay, leaving from fifth avenue and atwood st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER today
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:25 pm.
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 2 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 18 minutes..
Head southwest on Fifth avenue toward Meyran avenue..
Turn left onto Craft avenue..
Turn left onto Boulevard of the Allies..
Continue straight to stay on Boulevard of the Allies..
Continue straight onto Panther Hollow Rd..
Turn right onto Greenfield avenue..
Greenfield avenue turns right and becomes Greenfield Bridge..
Turn left onto Beechwood Blvd..
Keep right to stay on Beechwood Blvd..
Continue straight onto Browns Hill Rd..
Continue onto Homestead Grays Bridge..
Turn right onto west 5th avenue..
Turn right onto west Waterfront Dr..
Turn right..
Turn left..
Turn right. Destination will be on the left..
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER possibly
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
